author: cms-tau-pog
body:
Working version of dynamic strip reco implemented in PRs 10215, 10605, 10802. Suggestions by Slava have been implemented and all matrix tests are passing. For an overview of what's included in this PR, see:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/434527/?filterActive=1&showDate=all&showSession=4#preview:1627952
title: Dynamic strip reco v4
